content: Some tactics (annoyingly!) don't fail if they don't make any changes. I recall at some point there being a combinator that checked that an enclosed tactic block did something, and failed otherwise. Can anyone point me to this?
fail_if_no_progress (the shame of having to ask motivated me to look harder, sorry :-)
